name: Fortinet FortiAnalyzer输入验证错误漏洞（CNVD-2025-12793）
product: ["Fortinet FortiAnalyzer >=7.6.0\uff0c<=7.6.1", "Fortinet FortiManager >=7.6.0\uff0c<=7.6.1", "Fortinet FortiManager >=7.4.0\uff0c<=7.4.5", "Fortinet FortiAnalyzer >=7.0.0\uff0c<=7.0.13", "Fortinet FortiManager >=7.0.0\uff0c<=7.0.13", "Fortinet FortiAnalyzer >=7.4.0\uff0c<=7.4.5", "Fortinet FortiAnalyzer >=7.2.0\uff0c<=7.2.8", "Fortinet FortiManager >=7.2.0\uff0c<=7.2.8"]
description: Fortinet FortiAnalyzer是美国飞塔（Fortinet）公司的一套集中式网络安全报告解决方案。该产品主要用于收集网络日志数据，并通过报告套件对日志中的安全事件、网络流量、Web内容等进行分析、报告、归档操作。Fortinet FortiAnalyzer存在输入验证错误漏洞，该漏洞源于日志输出中和不当，攻击者可利用该漏洞导致日志污染。
solution:
厂商已发布了漏洞修复程序，请及时关注更新：
https://fortiguard.fortinet.com/psirt/FG-IR-24-453
patch: Fortinet FortiAnalyzer输入验证错误漏洞（CNVD-2025-12793）的补丁
